definition[0]: in or to a place, but you do not say or know exactly where
example[0]: My wallet must be around here somewhere.
example[1]: Go and play somewhere else (=in a different place) – I’m trying to work.
example[2]: We could meet for dinner at Giorgio’s or somewhere (=or a similar place).
example[3]: Is there somewhere safe where I can leave my bike?
example[4]: There must be somewhere to eat cheaply in this town.
